oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Form members of cast for Dutch play at Cockrill School, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo from the Nashville Times (1940), pictured the cast of a student play at Cockrill School. The young students are pictured in Dutch costumes. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cockrill School (Nashville,Tenn.)
Children’s plays--Tennessee--Nashville; School plays--Tennessee--Nashville; Entertainment events--Tennessee--Nashville
